title: Environmental Care
introduction: Islam teaches that the earth and all its resources are a trust (*amanah*) from Allah. As stewards (*khalifah*) on this earth, we are responsible for protecting and caring for the environment. By using resources wisely, avoiding waste, and showing kindness to all creatures, we show gratitude to Allah and fulfill our duty as caretakers of His creation.

sections.heading: Reduce Waste
sections.content: Allah says: *'And eat and drink but be not excessive. Indeed, He likes not those who commit excess.'* (Quran 7:31). Muslims are taught to use what they need without wasting food, water, or other resources. The Prophet ﷺ used water sparingly, even when abundant, and taught us to value every blessing. Recycling, reusing, and avoiding unnecessary consumption all help preserve resources for future generations.

sections.heading: Protect Nature
sections.content: Islam strongly encourages caring for the natural world. The Prophet ﷺ said: *'If a Muslim plants a tree or sows seeds, and then a bird, or a person, or an animal eats from it, it is regarded as charity.'* (Sahih Muslim 2732). Planting trees, protecting animals, and keeping water and land clean are all acts of worship. Polluting rivers, harming wildlife, or destroying plants without need goes against the spirit of Islam. Small acts like picking up litter or planting a flower can be a source of reward.

sections.heading: Community Action
sections.content: Environmental care is not just an individual effort — it’s a community responsibility. Join local clean-up projects, support sustainable practices, and encourage others to respect nature. The Prophet ﷺ said removing harmful things from pathways is a branch of faith. Community projects that protect the earth create a cleaner, safer environment for everyone and show gratitude for Allah’s blessings.

conclusion: Caring for the earth is an act of worship and gratitude to Allah. By being mindful of how we use resources, protecting nature, and working together, we fulfill our role as stewards of His creation. May Allah help us protect and preserve the environment for ourselves and future generations.
